# Export

Polygonjs can export your scenes in 2 ways:

-   [Online on CodeSandbox](/export/online): This is the fastest way to get an idea of what files are exported, without having to install anything

-   [Locally](/export/local): This is the ideal way to integrate Polygonjs scenes with your projects, as you'll have full control.

Let's have first a quick tour of <DocRouterLink bang href="/docs/export/online!" innerText="How Online Exports Work &rarr;"></DocRouterLink>
